dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2786 RH: To amend the Federal Power Act with respect to the criteria and process to qualify as a qualifying conduit hydropower facility.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Hudson (for himself and Ms. DeGette) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on June 6, 2017

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Power Act with respect to the criteria and process to qualify as a qualifying conduit hydropower facility.

section.text: Section 30(a) of the Federal Power Act (16 U.S.C. 823a(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2)(C), by striking 45 days and inserting 30 days; and

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by adding and after the semicolon;

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
